description:

description:
Look, we know how it goes. YouΓÇÖve got forty unread emails, a client on hold, and you suddenly realize you havenΓÇÖt actually said "thanks" to that person who makes your professional life a whole lot easier. You want to be thoughtful, but you also have a deadline in twenty minutes.

ThatΓÇÖs where The Standard Setter comes in. ItΓÇÖs got the "Angel" skincare basics, some "Oliva" botanicals that actually smell like a day off, and a bottle of something to pop open when the work is finally done. description:
